text: 44:29-30 Dɨboboniba 18:8-19Ofa gamir gumaziba, me wit tuamin ofa, ko arazir kuraba gɨn amangamin ofa ko, osɨmtɨziba agɨvamin ofaba, dagher kaba kar ofa gamir gumazibar dagheba. Egh Israelɨn nguazimɨn aven, bizir gumazamiziba na bagha arɨghizɨ da na baghvɨra itiba bar, ofa gamir gumaziba da iniam.
